About Me

I am a Computer Science undergraduate at Vishnu Institute of Technology (Expected May 2028). I specialize in full-stack development using the MERN stack, Next.js, and AI automation through n8n and LangChain.

Beyond code, I co-lead the GDG On-Campus Chapter, where I architect real-world projects and mentor fellow developers. I thrive on turning complex problems into clean, user-centric solutions.

How I Work

01

Understand First

I dig into the problem space before writing a single line. Good products come from understanding real needs, not assumptions.

02

Build to Ship

I focus on iterative development with real users in mind. Quick prototypes, fast feedback, steady improvement.

03

Clean by Default

Readable code and solid architecture from the start. Technical debt is a choice I prefer not to make.
